title: RIOT I would like to report something pls take seriously!
body: Not sure if i should post this on boards because it has to do with a player I have screen shotted the wrong doing if there is a way i can privatly communicate with a riot member pls let me know or advise the next step pls

replies.body:
Create a support ticket detailing the events that transpired.

You've done good to not post it on the boards. The boards are not for that kind of thing.

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=Zwcc5tl9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-10T23:55:04.363+0000)

> Create a support ticket detailing the events that transpired.

all good RIOT is dealing with this issue
